text: Many thanks to <@U6GNQ7JBU>! you sir are amazing and made my day better with your <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Add-css-async-option-to-module-s-meta-json-file/idc-p/668420/highlight/true#M118316|response in the community>. And thanks to whoever else worked on this
